Commentary.ab: The stanza is ridely corrupted. Probably later composed.
Y22.28a †vīspaiia aṣ̌auuane frauuaṣ̌e†] likely err. for dat. vīspaiiāi aṣ̌aōne frauuaṣ̌ə̄e.
Y22.28a †ke asti†] likely adapted from Pahl. Cf. PT MNW AYT'.
Y22.28a para.irista] sec. Ir. cod.; Geldner, Kellens para.iristi. Cf. PT wtʾlt HWEd.
Y22.28a †daɱi nāirike apərənāiiūke kainike vāstriiāuuarəzi†} err. loc. sg. for daɱe nāirikaiia apərənāiiūke kainikaiia vāstriiāuuarəzi. nāirike and kainike influenced from apərənāiiūke?
Y22.28a upa.šaēta] sec. most Ir. cod.; Geldner, Kellens upa.šaēti.
Y22.28a iziieiṇti] sec. cod. (some iziieiti/e), Geldner, Kellens. Form iziia-,but cf. PT OZLWNt, as translation of uziieiṇti?
Y22.28a paitiš.marəṇti] sec. cod.; Geldner paitiṣ̌marəṇti; Kellens (sec. Bartholomae) paitišmarəṇte. °-ṇti better attested. False cut for *paiti.šmarəṇti.
Y22.28a aiβi.nāsəṇti] Geldner, Kellens aiβināsəṇti. On long ā of the root, vid. Kellens, 1984 p. 354, n. 13.

Parallels.ab: kuuacit̰ aŋ́hā̊ zəmō = Yt12.22; ~ VS3.1, VS3.2, VS3.4, VS3.5, VS3.7, VS3.9, VS3.10, VS3.11, VS19.4 kuua [...] aŋ́hā°zəmō
para.irista daɱi nāirike apərənāiiuke kainike vāstriiāuuarezi upa.šaēta haca aɱāt̰ nmānat̰ iziieiṇti cf. Y26.7, Y26.8, Y26.9
daɱi nāirike apərənāiiuke kainike vāstriiāuuarezi ~ Y68.12 narąmca nāirinąmca apərənāiiūkanąmca kainikanąmca vāstriiāuuarəzanąmca
haca aɱāt̰ nmānat̰ iziieiṇti yā̊ paitišmarəṇti yā̊ aiβināsəṇti vaŋhūš yasnąsca vaɱąsca cf. Yt13.156, Yt13.157.
